activities: Legalbill.com, LLC d/b/a Quovant provides legal spend management services to corporate and risk law departments around the world. Quovant receives and processes data from law firms and corporate and risk law departments. This information is collected and processed in order to provide billing information and analysis to contracted clients and their law firms.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: All client specific data is covered by the Safe Harbor Framework including manually processed data.
recoursemech: Legalbill has agreed to binding arbitration pursuant to the commercial arbitration rules of the American Arbitration Association (AAA), ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program for complaints that cannot be resolved between Legalbill and the complainant.
